desc: Dzaiii soaps are UK handmade cold pressed soaps made in small batches. All soaps made from oils and butters using botanical clays and scented oils. Free from palm oil or synthetic fragrance or colorants. Not tested on animals. Luxury soaps a perfect match for the body. Dry and sensitive skin moisturizer. Award winning

layout.text: A Luxurious Embrace Of Nature To Your Skin
